Salient Features
why_choose: Why choose this course? Enables focused expertise in different specialisations of chemistry Offers hands-on research experience guided by experienced faculty Prepares individuals for leadership roles in industries like pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, materials science, and environmental science Enables students to cultivate research skills Connecting professionals and researchers via seminars, conferences, and collaborative projects Fosters critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and a deeper understanding of scientific principles.
what_learn: What you will learn? Deepening understanding of foundational principles in: Inorganic Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, Physical Chemistry,  Analytical Chemistry and Biochemistry Mastery of advanced laboratory techniques and instrumentation used in chemical analysis and experimentation. Will explore in interdisciplinary applications of chemistry, such as the intersection with biology, physics, materials science, and environmental science. Enhances the critical thinking skills to address complex scientific problems. Develop the ability to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world situations. Develop the ability to design, conduct, and analyze original research projects by acquiring skills in data interpretation, literature review, and scientific communication
career: Career prospects Employment in industries such as pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, materials science, and chemical manufacturing Pursue a career in academia as a lecturer also opportunities to teach and mentor students in chemistry-related disciplines. Work in forensic laboratories or law enforcement agencies. Careers in Patents and IPR PhD in reputed institutes in India and abroad Provide expertise as a consultant to industries dealing with chemical processes, safety, or environmental compliance
